data.persona: I am a servant in a large house. I clean dishes and help the rich people get dressed. I live under the house in a cozy little room and I have lots to eat. My job is pretty good.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Garden.
The Palace garden is a lavish and lush garden filled with delicate roses and towering trees. In the center of the garden stand's a statue of the nation's founding leader. The statue is surrounded by a moat. There are stone walk ways throughout the gardens for visitors to walk through.
There's a trowel, an eisel, and a footstool here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to make the garden look beautiful.
data.mid_motivation: I want to impress the rich people in the house.
data.long_motivation: I want to become known as the best servant in all the kingdom.
